description:
Volodymyr Zelensky invited Pope Francis to visit Ukraine. Pope Francis, when later asked if he was considering a visit to Ukraine responded that "Yes, it is on the table."

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Pope Francis visits Ukraine between April 11, 2022 and May 13, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, a "visit" is defined as Pope Francis physically entering the terrestrial or maritime territory of Ukraine. Whether or not Pope Francis enters Ukrainian airspace during the timeframe of this market will have no bearing on a positive resolution.

The primary resolution source for this information will be official information from The Vatican (e.g. https://www.vaticannews.va/en.html); however, other credible reporting may be considered.

events.title: Will Pope Francis visit Ukraine by May 13, 2022?

question: Will Pope Francis visit Ukraine by May 13, 2022?
